alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued December 15 at 2:28PM EST until December 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. The Coastal Flood Watch has been cancelled. * WHERE...Franklin County Beaches. * WHEN...Through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Water rises are expected to be minimal on Saturday night, thus the coastal flood watch has been cancelled. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
